name: Amazoness Pet Liger
desc:
"Amazoness Tiger" + 1 "Amazoness" monster
If this card attacks, during damage calculation: You can make this card gain 500 ATK during that damage calculation only. If an "Amazoness" monster you control attacks an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses 800 ATK. Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack "Amazoness" monsters, except this one.
